text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS False!!!!!  Trump has done Absolutely Nothing to prevent coronavirus spread, 8500 people in California are being monitored,  all of the hospital staff the 1 patient was at could be infected, now there are cases in NY..Trump is endangering Americans with these lies

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
